event.name: "Years of Living Dangerously" Watch Party in Appleton
event.description: Join Wisconsin League of Conservation Voters to watch the premiere of Showtime’s new climate change documentary series " Years of Living Dangerously. " We'll watch the show and then talk about what we can do to fight climate change here in Wisconsin.

event.description: Join Wisconsin League of Conservation Voters to watch the premiere of Showtime’s new climate change documentary series " Years of Living Dangerously. " We'll watch the show and then talk about what we can do to fight climate change here in Wisconsin.
